website_summaries.verdict: The Vibram FiveFingers EL-X is an Entry Level Crosstrainer which has the lightest and the thinnest sole in Vibram’s line-up of “toe shoes.” The shoe takes a little getting used to because it is designed for barefoot runners. However, reviews show that once the right fit and familiarity are met, the shoe is easily one of the most comfortable and versatile on the market. Runners who can get past the weird style should have a truly barefoot running experience with just enough protection on paved roads in this shoe.
pros: A large number of runners concluded that this is the closest thing they have to barefoot running without literally going barefoot
The lightweight and flexible nature of this shoe were received well by fans
It shines in the gym or indoor workouts, according to a significant number of users
The shoe dries quickly, based on the comments of several reviewers
Several consumers appreciated the breathable upper unit
Many runners consider the price as affordable and worthy of the Vibram EL-X’s quality
Traction is fairly good, as reported by a moderate number of runners
A handful of runners who have had knee or shin issues were able to run without any pain in the FiveFingers EL-X
The ground feedback provided by this product was greatly welcomed by those who appreciated barefoot running
cons: For a consumer, this running shoe had a tendency to stink, even after he has washed it
The tightness and snugness of the fit, which is needed to keep the shoe in place, often restrict movements, according to a handful of runners
Several runners felt that the uniqueness of this shoe’s façade didn’t appeal positively to the people around them
Putting on the shoe was a challenge for some testers

customer_reviews.title: I love FiveFingers in general (Laced) but the lace-less
customer_reviews.text: I love FiveFingers in general (Laced) but the lace-less, slip-on style of these just don't suit my feet. I found them tight across the forefoot in all sizes I tried (EU 42-44, UK 8-10, I'm usually EU 43/UK 9 in other styles) which I assume is designed that way due to the lack of adjust-ability that laces provide. If you have a slightly wider than average foot, I doubt these will be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: About as close as you can get to being barefoot with added protection
customer_reviews.text: I use these indoors for weight training, they're about as close as you can get to being barefoot. I'm size 7, bought size 7, perfect fit. Feet feel nice and planted whilst I'm going through the motions. I do find I have to remove them in between exercises to allow my feet to breathe as they do get a little sweaty in there.
customer_reviews.author: The Kragle

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR RUNNING
customer_reviews.text: I am a runner and would never use for running, however I love it for drumming, taking it to friends/relatives houses as a clean pair to be in the house. And you can even swim (if it is a small part of the journey from point A to B - I am a distance swimmer), but yeah unless you are Taraumara (awesome barefoot runners) would not recommend for running
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I run weekly half-marathons and 10k in these, both on roads and trails, and these are the most fun of the shoes I've ever used (vs vivobarefoot, xero-shoes, Altra). Nothing hurts after running unlike many other shoes, and as a result I don't stretch afterwards yet remain injury-free. Very stable off-road. Absence of shoe laces is also a great, no-fuss solution for a lazy endurance athlete like myself!
customer_reviews.author: Denis B

customer_reviews.title: A little tight to start
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the gym mainly, they were a little tight to start but after a few wears you forget you have anything on. Had them a few months now and still haven't been running in them as I have very weak arches so waiting for them to strengthen. The quality feels good looking forward to some warm dry weather to get better use from them
customer_reviews.author: Dean Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Wide feet go upto two sizes up
customer_reviews.text: Bought primarily for lifting weights. Comfortable but be aware if you have wide feet, you might need to go up to two sizes up. I wear a UK6/6.5 I had purchased the 7/7.5 first, these where too tight especially in the toes. Returned and purchased a 7.5/8 much better fit. Good shoes need better sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Ayigiyigi

customer_reviews.title: Other than that i love wearing these around
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair i own. Take the advice literally and don't over use these when starting out. Other than that i love wearing these around. no tripping over flip flops but still feel like im barefoot and enjoying the elements.
customer_reviews.author: K-Flex

customer_reviews.title: So comfy and soft but tuff.
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable, I should have gone a size smaller but that was my choice. Still comfy and supportive. I've used for the gym mainly but did do an outdoor run. They stood up to the dirt and gravel well. My training and posture while training has improved. Grip is amazing as well. I was worried about getting my toes in but the trainer just glide on. I do have to manipulate my little toes but that's just genetics I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: kieron

customer_reviews.title: Feedback
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived quickly, and the shoe fit perfectly to my size 10 feet. I bought the size 10/10.5 I'm currently using these as gym / heavy bag / martial art shoes, and I haven't had any major issues. It did feel very awkward to me at first, but now they have grown on me. The only thing that i have noticed (which may be bad for some) is that I'd noticed my big toe was becoming sore from the rubbing, however that was because I was performing kicks and stuff. Other than that I am very impressed :D.
customer_reviews.author: Kavin Wong

customer_reviews.title: Unfit product, very misleading.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a gift for my Dad. But found out the size is so small that it doesn't fit him. I opened a return but because it was outside 30 days I couldn't return it. It's just not worth buying because size are not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Tanim Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant shoes for barefoot work -
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are light and perfect for barefoot work at the gym. They ran a bit smaller than I expected even though I bought it using as reference another pair of Vibram FiveFingers I already owned that fit... like a glove. I wash them every two to three weeks - but I am lucky that my feet bacteria are quite well behaved. I just throw them in the wash alongside the rest of my lycra gym clothes using antibacterial soap - I always make sure to air dry them. Once I made the mistake of leaving an old pair in the machine for a drying cycle - they did not survive.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Curiel

customer_reviews.title: 3rd pair just amazing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Shoes! This is my 3rd pair of Fivefingers as my other 2 Leather Trek ascent and Ascent were finally put out of their misery after 2 and a half years of wear and tear! Which is pretty amazing seeing i use them for everything from day to day use (indoor and outdoor) in all weathers! These fit amazing and i intend to use these for mainly indoor training and outdoor when its sunny and warm :)! Awesome brand defo recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Long

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym or on holiday
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my Greek trip and for the gym - very comfy, great fit, takes a little getting used too but soon forgot I had them on.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and very comfortable. Just a shame they aren't slightly better made, the glue is coming away already but this happens with every pair I've owned. Still a good buy though.
customer_reviews.author: IAJ

customer_reviews.title: Defo worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, takes a lot of getting used too need to rest allot wearing this but take it slow will be fine grip is great with awesome raid feel, more like a sock.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Once you get use to separating your toes it gets easier to put on, once on feels like walking in socks with firm soles
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for training
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my son, he’s really pleased with them, fit is perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: LollyBee

customer_reviews.title: Feel good once they are on
customer_reviews.text: Feel good once they are on... can be difficult to get toes in the right areas though... this could be something to do with my toes, or just because the shoes are new! Came up slightly tight so I would suggest half a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Bograt

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, but as usual takes a bit of getting used to. Very flexible fitting Very lightweight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes I really do love these things
customer_reviews.text: Yes I really do love these things, in the summer I wore them all the time... and when I noticed that I'd worn them a bit long, I just wore them into shower, hung them up, they were dry, fresh and ready to wear by the end of the day, cool!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan J.

customer_reviews.title: Thin soles but very comfortable, stretch to your size perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and fairly durable, only ever wear these as finding shoes/trainers the right width and size is virtually impossible Current pair have not lasted as long as previously and have become unglued in places but as I wear them constantly, I'll live with that
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: its ok
customer_reviews.text: not as good as my last ones. i start to slip on the tread mill and it does not appear to have much grip.
customer_reviews.author: Daz

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product, I have a few pairs of these type of shoes. I love them. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for on the beach and diving straight into the sea
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product, just make sure you get the right size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: slightly bigger than my feet but they are exactly what i needed :) tested for 3 months. no problems with the trainers but my feet are taking alot longer to get tougher than i expected...
customer_reviews.author: Jack Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: But surprised at after paying this amount and always wanting a pair to find after 3 hours of wearing they are falling apart, the big toe and in the bunion area which I don’t have
customer_reviews.author: Mark ingham

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've done for my feet
customer_reviews.text: It's so comfortable that makes me not wanting to take them off my feet. In fact I've been wearing them since I got them delivered at home. Girlfriend is not happy cos I wear them in bed. I don't know how long my toe nails are.
customer_reviews.author: Dal

customer_reviews.title: Great footwear
customer_reviews.text: Brought them for my partner for fathers day..he loves them says its like walking barefoot
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Slightly oversized
customer_reviews.text: Came slightly larger than I would have expected so had to return them and get a size smaller
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great to exercise in
customer_reviews.text: Really great to exercise in. Ensure a good fit so that usage does not lead to raw feet.
customer_reviews.author: Savvylogic

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: First time of having vibram and i love it so far! I recommend getting 8-8.5 if your tts is 8uk for a perfect fit not the 7.5-8.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. I have flat feet but these wrapped around ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I have flat feet but these wrapped around them nicer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great fun running in these.
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Initially I thought the fit was too small when walking around the house but they feel fine when running. They are so minimal it's just like sticking a piece of rubber to your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Robot

customer_reviews.title: Order 2-3 sizes below your usual shoe size!
customer_reviews.text: Third pair lucky! The product itself is fantastic but it took three attempts to get the correct size. Order 2-3 sizes below your usual shoe size!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Poppleton

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for brother and he loves them
customer_reviews.author: Kim87

customer_reviews.title: Really good product so comfy takes some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: I would buy these one full size down if buying again
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hirst

customer_reviews.title: I first bought size 7 which is my size but ...
customer_reviews.text: I first bought size 7 which is my size but were too small, then bought size 81/2 which fit very well but leaves room at the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Khumalo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! It's my second pair and the first one lasted for years.
customer_reviews.author: Comodus Maximus

customer_reviews.title: I don't consider it good enough for running in them and after reading a ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't consider it good enough for running in them and after reading a few of the studies... I left them as beach running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Godly
customer_reviews.text: Best footwear I've ever purchased. Easy to get on and yet stay on. Very light and can fold for storage. Breathable and yet warm. I took them canoeing and more than once had them submerged but they took longer than expected to dry, however. It is still ultimately a shoe! I'd recommend getting the specifically made water ones if that's what you want them for. They also make an excellent conversation piece. So many people ask me about them.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Arrowsmith

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant at T-shirt best!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son as Christmas gift. He loves these Vibrams, has others, very pleased. I’m sure anyone who has experienced this footwear, would agree.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: absolutely awesome. just whole new level. must have for gym.
customer_reviews.author: Andrzej Zych

product_meta.title: Vibram FiveFingers Men's El-x Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: Designed to be simple, comfortable,easy on, easy off, the EL-X is an ideal shoe for those looking for a true minimalist experience
feature_bullets: 3mm TC-1 Rubber Outsole - Providing slip resistance and great ground feedback.
EVA Insole - Provides plating protection and comfort.
Stretch Mesh Upper - Breathable fabric ensuring a snug, flexible fit.
PU Toe Protection and Coconut Active Carbon - For protection and durability.
